name: Until You Fall
summary: Master your fighting style in this virtual reality hack-and-slash roguelite, filled with melee combat. Swordfight through powerful enemies, and grow stronger along the way. Fight. Fall. Rise Again.
info:
• 中文名: 灵魂陨落
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: VR ACT
  • 开发商: Schell Games
  • 发行: Schell Games
  • 发行日期: 2019年8月27日
